original: Majjhima Nikāya 67
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cātumasutta
analyzed: cātumasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā cātumāyaṁ viharati āmalakīvane.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā cātumāyam viharati āmalakīvane

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāriputta moggallāna ppamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhu satāni anuppattāni honti bhagavantam dassanāya

original: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṁ.
analyzed: te ca āgantukāḥ bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhim paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā patta cīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddāḥ mahāsaddāḥ ahesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “ke panete, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
analyzed: ke pana ete ānanda uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe maccha vilopā iti

original: “Etāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: etāni bhante sāriputta moggallāna ppamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhu satāni an uppattāni bhagavantam dassanāya

original: Te āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
analyzed: te āgantukāḥ bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhim paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā patta cīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddāḥ mahāsaddā ti

original: “Tenahānanda, mama vacanena te bhikkhū āmantehi:
analyzed: tena ha ānanda mama vacanena te bhikkhū āmantehi

original: ‘satthā āyasmante āmantetī’”ti.
analyzed: satthā āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasman ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “satthā āyasmante āmantetī”ti.
analyzed: satthā āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ ānandassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinne kho

original: te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: te bhikkhū bhagavān etat avoca

original: “kiṁ nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
analyzed: kim nu tumhe bhikkhave uccāsaddāḥ mahāsaddāḥ kevaṭṭāḥ maññe maccha vilopeti

original: “Imāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: imāni bhante sāriputta moggallāna ppamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhu satāni an uppattāni bhagavantam dassanāya

original: Teme āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
analyzed: te ime āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhim paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā patta cīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ti

original: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo, na vo mama santike vatthabban”ti.
analyzed: gacchatha bhikkhave paṇāmemi vaḥ na vaḥ mama santike vatthabbanti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya pakkamisu

original: Tena kho pana samayena cātumeyyakā sakyā santhāgāre sannipatitā honti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena cātumeyyakā sakyā santhāgāre sannipatitāḥ honti kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: Addasaṁsu kho cātumeyyakā sakyā te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
analyzed: addasasu kho cātumeyyakā sakyā te bhikkhū dūratas vas āgacchante

original: disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: disvāna yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “handa kahaṁ pana tumhe āyasmanto gacchathā”ti?
analyzed: handa kaham pana tumhe āyasmantaḥ gacchatha ati

original: “Bhagavatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhusaṅgho paṇāmito”ti.
analyzed: bhagavatā kho āvuso bhikkhu saṅghaḥ paṇāmitaḥ ti

original: “Tenahāyasmanto muhuttaṁ nisīdatha, appeva nāma mayaṁ sakkuṇeyyāma bhagavantaṁ pasādetun”ti.
analyzed: tenaha ayasmantaḥ muhuttam nisīdatha appā iva nāma mayam sakkuṇeyyāma bhagavantam pasādetunti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū cātumeyyakānaṁ sakyānaṁ paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū cātumeyyakānam sakyānam

original: Atha kho cātumeyyakā sakyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho cātumeyyakā sakyā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho cātumeyyakā sakyāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnā kho cātumeyyakā sakyāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ;
analyzed: abhinandatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: abhivadatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito; evameva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ anuggahitaḥ evam eva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
analyzed: santi ittha bhante bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya

original: Tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: tesam bhagavantam dassanāya a labhantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmo

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante bījānam taruṇānam udakam a labhantānam siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam dassanāya a labhantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante vacchassa taruṇassa mātaram a passantassa siyā siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam apassantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmo

original: Abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ;
analyzed: abhinandatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: abhivadatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito; evameva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ anuggahitaḥ evam eva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhu saṅghanti

original: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma
analyzed: atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetaḥ upari vitakkam aññāyaseyyathā api nāma

original: balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evameva—brahmaloke
analyzed: balavā purisaḥ samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam eva brahma loke

original: antarahito bhagavato purato pāturahosi.
analyzed: antara hitaḥ bhagavataḥ puratas pātuḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu brahmā sahampatiḥ ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ;
analyzed: abhinandatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: abhivadatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito; evameva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ anuggahitaḥ evam eva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: santi ittha bhante bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam dassanāya a labhantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante bījānam taruṇānam udakam a labhantānam siyā aññathatta siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam dassanāya a labhantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante vacchassa taruṇassa mātaram a passantassa siyā siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam apassantānam siyā siyā vipariṇāmo

original: Abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ;
analyzed: abhinandatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ.
analyzed: abhivadatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito; evameva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ anuggahitaḥ evam eva bhagavā etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhu saṅghanti

original: Asakkhiṁsu kho cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati bhagavantaṁ pasādetuṁ bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena ca.
analyzed: asakkhisu kho cātumeyyakā ca sakyāḥ brahmā ca sahampati bhagavantam pasādetum bīja upamena ca taruṇa upamena ca

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “uṭṭhethāvuso, gaṇhatha pattacīvaraṁ.
analyzed: uṭṭhetha āvuso gaṇhatha patta cīvara

original: Pasādito bhagavā cātumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmunā ca sahampatinā bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena cā”ti.
analyzed: pasāditaḥ bhagavā cātumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmunā ca sahampatinā bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena ca ati

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pattacīvaramādāya
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāya āsanā patta cīvaram ādāya

original: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam sāriputtam bhagavān etat avoca

original: “kinti te, sāriputta, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite”ti?
analyzed: kinti te sāriputta ahosi mayā bhikkhu saṅghe paṇāmitā iti

original: “Evaṁ kho me, bhante, ahosi:
analyzed: evam kho me bhante ahosi

original: ‘bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅgho paṇāmito.
analyzed: bhagavatā bhikkhu saṅghaḥ paṇāmitaḥ

original: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ anuyutto viharissati, mayampi dāni appossukkā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuttā viharissāmā’”ti.
analyzed: appossukkaḥ dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāram anuyuttaḥ viharissati mayam pi dāni appossukkāḥ diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāram anuyuttāḥ viharissāma ati

original: “Āgamehi tvaṁ, sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṁ, sāriputta, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāran”ti.
analyzed: āgamehi tva sāriputta āgamehi tva sāriputta diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāranti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam āmantesi

original: “kinti te, moggallāna, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite”ti?
analyzed: kinti te moggallāna ahosi mayā bhikkhu saṅghe paṇāmitā iti

original: “Evaṁ kho me, bhante, ahosi:
analyzed: evam kho me bhante ahosi

original: ‘bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅgho paṇāmito.
analyzed: bhagavatā bhikkhu saṅghaḥ paṇāmitaḥ

original: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ anuyutto viharissati, ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmā’”ti.
analyzed: appossukkaḥ dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāram anuyuttaḥ viharissati aham ca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhu saṅgham pariharissāma ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, moggallāna.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu moggallāna

original: Ahaṁ vā hi, moggallāna, bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parihareyyaṁ sāriputtamoggallānā vā”ti.
analyzed: aham vā hi moggallāna bhikkhu saṅgham parihareyyam sāriputta moggallānā vā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni

original: Katamāni cattāri?
analyzed: katamāni cattāri

original: Ūmibhayaṁ, kumbhīlabhayaṁ, āvaṭṭabhayaṁ, susukābhayaṁ—
analyzed: ūmibhaya kumbhīlabhaya āvaṭṭabhaya susukābhaya

original: imāni, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
analyzed: imāni bhikkhave cattāri bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattārimāni bhayāni idhekacce puggale imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave cattārimāni bhayāni idha ekacce puggale imasmin dhamma vinaye agārasma anagāriyam pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni

original: Katamāni cattāri?
analyzed: katamāni cattāri

original: Ūmibhayaṁ, kumbhīlabhayaṁ, āvaṭṭabhayaṁ, susukābhayaṁ.
analyzed: ūmibhaya kumbhīlabhaya āvaṭṭabhaya susukābhaya

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, ūmibhayaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave ūmibhaya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārī ovadanti, anusāsanti:

original: ‘evaṁ te abhikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te paṭikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te ālokitabbaṁ, evaṁ te vilokitabbaṁ,
analyzed: evam te abhikkamitabba evam te paṭikkamitabba evam te ālokitabba evam te vilokitabba

original: evaṁ te samiñjitabbaṁ, evaṁ te pasāritabbaṁ, evaṁ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṁ dhāretabban’ti.

original: Tassa evaṁ hoti:

original: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāma, anusāsāma.
analyzed: mayam kho pubbe agāriya bhūtā samānāḥ aññe ovadāma anusāsāma

original: Ime panamhākaṁ puttamattā maññe, nattamattā maññe, amhe ovaditabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī’ti.
analyzed: ime pana amhākam putta mattāḥ maññe natta mattāḥ maññe amhe ovaditabbam anusāsitabbam maññanti iti

original: So sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: so sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ūmibhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave ūmi bhayassa bhīto sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvatto

original: ‘Ūmibhayan’ti kho, bhikkhave, kodhupāyāsassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, kumbhīlabhayaṁ?

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.

original: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārī ovadanti anusāsanti:

original: ‘idaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, idaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ; idaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, idaṁ te na bhuñjitabbaṁ;
analyzed: idam te khāditabba idam te na khāditabba idam te bhuñjitabba idam te na bhuñjitabba

analyzed: idam te sāyitabba idam te na sāyitabba idam te pātabba idam te na pātabba

original: kappiyaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ; kappiyaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ

analyzed: sāyitabba kāle te pātabba vikāle te na pātabbanti

original: Tassa evaṁ hoti: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā yaṁ icchāma taṁ khādāma, yaṁ
analyzed: tassa evam hoti mayam kho pubbe agāriya bhūtā samānā yam icchāma tam khādāma

original: sāyāma; kālepi pivāma, vikālepi pivāma.

original: Yampi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ denti tatthapime mukhāvaraṇaṁ maññe karontī’ti.
analyzed: yam pi no saddhāḥ gahapatikāḥ divā vikāle paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam denti tattha api ime mukha āvaraṇam maññe karonti iti

original: So sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: so sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave kumbhīla bhayassa bhīto sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvatto

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.

original: Saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā.

analyzed: sakkā bhoge ca bhuñjitum puññāni ca kātunti

analyzed: so sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave āvaṭṭa bhayassa bhīto sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvatto

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, susukābhayaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisati

original: Arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
analyzed: a rakkhitena iva kāyena a rakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā a savutehi indriyehi so tattha passati mātugāmam dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā

original: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tassa mātugāmam disvā dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: so rāga anuddhasena cittena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, susukābhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave susukā bhayassa bhīto sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvatto

original: ‘Susukābhayan’ti kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: kho bhikkhave mātugāmassa etam

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni, idhekacce puggale imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī”ti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri bhayāni idha ekacce puggale imasmin dhamma vinaye agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Cātumasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: cātumasuttam niṭṭhitam sattama
